refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: M = cummax(A) M = cummax(A,dim) M = cummax(_,direction)

listitem.para: Input Array. Can be real or complex and a vector or matrix. For complex elements, cummax compares the magnitude of elements. If the magnitude are same, phase angles are compared.
Dimension to operate along. If no dimension is specified, then the default value is the first array dimension whose value is greater than 1. Should be a natural number.
Direction of operation. String flag - 'forward' (default) or 'reverse'
